content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 33, "index": 22}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 25, "index": 25}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 12, "index": 37}]
thought: To craft a soul torch I need to make charcoal and a stick. To make charcoal I need to smelt wood, so I will start by smelting the oak wood at slot 31.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 31 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 33, "index": 22}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 25, "index": 25}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 12, "index": 37}]
thought: To make a stick I need to place two bamboo side-by-side in the crafting grid, so I will move one piece of bamboo to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 33, "index": 22}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 25, "index": 25}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 12, "index": 37}]
thought: To make a stick I need to place two bamboo side-by-side in the crafting grid, so I will move the second piece of bamboo to slot 4, which is next to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 33, "index": 22}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 25, "index": 25}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 12, "index": 37}]
thought: I have crafted a stick, so I will move it from the craft slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 33, "index": 22}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 25, "index": 25}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 12, "index": 37}]
thought: To craft a soul torch, I first need to craft a stick. To craft a stick I need to place charcoal in the middle of the crafting grid, so I am going to move the charcoal from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 33, "index": 22}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 25, "index": 25}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 12, "index": 37}]
thought: I have already placed the charcoal in the center of the crafting grid, and now I need to place the stick above it. Therefore, I will move the stick from slot 12 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "torch", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 33, "index": 22}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 25, "index": 25}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 12, "index": 37}]

thought: Now that I have crafted the stick, I can craft the soul torch. To do this, I need to place the soul soil below the stick in the crafting grid. So I will move the soul soil from slot 27 to slot 7.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 7 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "soul_torch", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 33, "index": 22}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 25, "index": 25}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 12, "index": 37}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the soul torch, I can move it to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
